LanguageData.Cults_BastNoCatOnMap: Bast found no eligible cats to transform.
LanguageData.Cults_BastNoEnemiesOnMap: Bast deems it is not neccesary to ask for this favor right now.
LanguageData.Cults_BastGuardianTransformationDescript: Bast transforms {0} into a mighty guardian!
LanguageData.Cults_BastGameOver: Your life as a colonist is no more. You now bask in the glory of Bast for eternity in A'aru.
